Key.Original: Take on the role of a NATO CTRG special operator in the 1-4 player "Apex Protocol" co-op campaign. It consists of highly replayable missions, featuring a drop-in / drop-out multiplayer structure, and the difficulty scales up or down based on the number of players.
Key.Chinese: 擔任北約戰研大隊的特戰兵，一同參與"頂尖協議"1-4名玩家合作戰役。此戰役有著高度重玩性與挑戰性的任務，並設計成可以中間加入/離開的多人遊戲架構，而任務難度則由參與玩家的人數多寡來自動進行調整。
Key.Chinesesimp: 担任北约战研大队的特战兵，一同参与"顶尖协议"1-4名玩家合作战役。此战役有着高度重玩性与挑战性的任务，并设计成可以中间加入/离开的多人游戏架构，而任务难度则由参与玩家的人数多寡来自动进行调整。

Key.Original: Experience the End Game mode in a singleplayer environment. Secure and upload valuable schematics on Tanoa before the enemy is able to stop you.
Key.Chinese: 在單人遊戲下體驗終戰模式。在塔諾亞上進行肅清與上傳武器藍圖的任務，別讓敵人阻止你完成任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在单人游戏下体验终战模式。在塔诺亚上进行肃清与上传武器蓝图的任务，别让敌人阻止你完成任务。

Key.Original: Use sea, air and land vehicles to secure victory over the valuable schematics on Balavu island.
Key.Chinese: 在巴拉武島上使用陸，海，空載具來奪取武器藍圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在巴拉武岛上使用陆，海，空载具来夺取武器蓝图。

Key.Original: Battle through the city of Moddergat and the nearby jungle to secure and upload the valuable schematics during intense infantry combat.
Key.Chinese: 此任務著重於步兵戰，任務是在莫德爾加城市與附近的叢林中爭奪並上傳武器藍圖。
Key.Chinesesimp: 此任务着重于步兵战斗，任务是在莫德尔加市与附近的丛林中争夺并上传武器蓝图。

Key.Original: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
Key.Chinese: 戰場上不容忍友軍傷害!
Key.Chinesesimp: 战场上不容忍友军伤害!

Key.Original: You disobeyed direct orders and seriously jeopardized the operation.
Key.Chinese: 你不服從命令，已經嚴重影響到整個任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不服从命令，已经严重影响到整个任务。

Key.Original: Land at the Kamino base heliport and unload the squad.
Key.Chinese: 降落在卡米諾基地並卸載小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落在卡米诺基地的直升机坪并卸载小队。

Key.Original: Transport the Viper SF team to Kamino base.
Key.Chinese: 運輸毒蛇特種部隊到卡米諾基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输毒蛇特种部队到卡米诺基地。

Key.Original: Board the transport helicopter and take off ASAP.
Key.Chinese: 搭乘運輸直升機并盡快起飛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搭乘运输直升机并尽快起飞。

Key.Original: Take on Arma 3's rotor-wing flight. Transport a Quick Reaction Force to the scene of an attack on one of our facilities.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3的直升機。運輸一支快速應變部隊到正在遭受攻擊的我方設施。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3的直升机。运输一支快速反应部队到正在遭受攻击的我方设施。

Key.Original: Return to Base. Land on the starting position at hangar A6.
Key.Chinese: 返回基地。降落在剛開始起飛的地點，位置是A6機庫。
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回基地。降落在刚开始起飞的地点，位置是A6机库。

Key.Chinese: 重新補給彈藥(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 重新补给弹药(支线任务)

Key.Original: Refill your ammo and fuel at Camp Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 在羅根營地重新補給彈藥與油料。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在罗根营地重新补给弹药与油料。

Key.Original: Fly to Camp Rogain and refill ammo and fuel. Await further intel.
Key.Chinese: 飛往羅根營地降落，並進行補給。然後請等待進一步命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞往罗根营地降落并进行补给。等待进一步命令。

Key.Original: Follow the pre-planned route and land at Kamino base.
Key.Chinese: 按照預先計畫的路線飛到卡米諾基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 按照预先计划的路线飞到卡米诺基地。

Key.Original: Destroy enemy mortar emplacements located on a rocky island, east of the coast, 800m away.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀敵軍的迫擊砲陣地，地點位在海岸東邊800公尺左右的小島上。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁敌军的迫击炮阵地，地点位在海岸东边800米左右的礁石岛上。

Key.Original: Seek and destroy the enemy mortars bombarding Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: 搜尋並摧毀正在攻擊Mike-26基地的迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 搜寻并摧毁正在攻击Mike-26设施的迫击炮。

Key.Original: Stop enemy vehicles en route to Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: 阻止正在開往Mike-26基地的敵軍車輛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 阻止正在开往Mike-26基地的敌军车辆。

Key.Original: Land at Mike-26 base and unload the squad.
Key.Chinese: 降落在Mike-26基地並卸載小隊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 降落在Mike-26基地并卸载小队。

Key.Original: Coordinate with Griffin and defend Mike-26 from enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 與"獅鷲"協調，並從敵軍的手中保護Mike-26基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与"狮鹫"协调，并从敌军的手中保护Mike-26基地。

Key.Original: Thanks to well executed aerial support, ground forces managed to fend off both attacks on Mike-26 and Kamino base. Enemy forces were decimated.
Key.Chinese: 多虧了優秀的空中支援，地面部隊成功抵禦了兩處攻擊，包括Mike-26和卡米諾這兩處基地。敵軍已被消滅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 多亏了优秀的空中支援，地面部队成功抵御了针对Mike-26和卡米诺这两处基地的攻击。敌军已被消灭。

Key.Original:
%3Kamino base%1 has come under attack. We believe enemy forces have linked up with local guerrillas and have launched a surprise hit-and-run assault.
A motorized Quick Response Force has been dispatched to the %3area%1, but our forces are in need of immediate relief. Three SF squads - Vipers Red, Blue and Green - are preparing an assault. These teams will be deployed by helicopter = callsigns Hydra, Chimera and Dragon - dispatched from %2Stratis airfield%1.
With aerial support, they should be able to fight off the enemy forces until ground reinforcements arrive.
Key.Chinese:
%3卡米諾基地%1正在遭受攻擊。我們相信敵軍是聯合了當地的游擊隊，來發動突如其來的游擊戰。
一支快速應變部隊已經出動到該%3區域%1了，但是我們的部隊仍需要緊急支援。三支特種部隊-"毒蛇-紅"，"藍"和"綠"-正在準備進行支援。這些小隊將由"九頭蛇"，"奇美拉"和"龍"等直升機來部屬，他們將從%2斯特拉蒂斯空軍基地%1出發。
藉著空中支援，他們應該可以擊退敵軍的部隊直到地面援軍抵達。
Key.Chinesesimp:
%3卡米诺基地%1正在遭受攻击。我们相信敌军是联合了当地的游击队，发动突如其来的游击战。
一支快速反应部队已经出动到该%3区域%1了，但是我们的部队仍需要紧急支援。三支特种部队-"毒蛇-红"，"蓝"和"绿"-正在准备进行支援。这些小队将由"九头蛇"，"奇美拉"和"龙"等直升机来部署，他们将从%2斯特拉蒂斯空军基地%1出发。
凭借空中支援，他们应该可以击退敌军的部队直到地面援军抵达。

Key.Original:
%3Griffin%1 - Central command; located at Stratis airfield
%4Tiger%1 - Kamino base command
%2Hydra%1 - Transport helicopter; transporting team Viper-Red
%2Chimera%1 - Transport helicopter; transporting team Viper-Blue
%2Dragon%1 - Transport helicopter; transporting team Viper-Green
%2Viper-Red%1 - SF team; carried by Hydra
%2Viper-Blue%1 - SF team; carried by Chimera
%2Viper-Green%1 - SF team; carried by Dragon
Key.Chinese:
%3Griffin%1-中央司令部;位在Stratis空軍基地
%4"Tiger"%1-卡米諾基地的指揮官
%2"九頭蛇"%1-運輸直升機;運輸"毒蛇-紅"小隊
%2"奇美拉"%1-運輸直升機;運輸"毒蛇-藍"小隊
%2"龍"%1-運輸直升機;運輸"毒蛇-綠"小隊
%2"毒蛇-紅"%1-特種部隊;搭乘"九頭蛇"
%2"毒蛇-藍"%1-特種部隊;搭乘"奇美拉"
%2"毒蛇-綠"%1-特種部隊;搭乘"龍"
Key.Chinesesimp:
%3"狮鹫"%1-中央司令部;位于斯特拉蒂斯空军基地
%4"虎"%1-卡米诺基地的指挥官
%2"九头蛇"%1-运输直升机;运输"毒蛇-红"小组
%2"奇美拉"%1-运输直升机;运输"毒蛇-蓝"小组
%2"龙"%1-运输直升机;运输"毒蛇-绿"小组
%2"毒蛇-红"%1-特种部队;搭乘"九头蛇"
%2"毒蛇-蓝"%1-特种部队;搭乘"奇美拉"
%2"毒蛇-绿"%1-特种部队;搭乘"龙"

Key.Original: Transport the Quick Response Force to %2our base%1 and provide air support. Hold the base until ground reinforcements arrive.<br \> Be ready for more intel as the situation develops.
Key.Chinese: 運輸一支快速應變部隊到%2我們的基地%1，並提供空中支援。守護好基地直到地面援軍抵達。<br\> 隨著形勢的發展，請隨時準備好接收更多情報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 运输一支快速反应部队到%2我们的基地%1，并提供空中支援。保护好基地直到地面援军抵达。<br\> 随着形势的发展，请随时准备好接收更多情报。

Key.Original:
1. Board the %2helicopter%1 and wait for the Viper team to embark, then take off.
2. Transport the Viper team to the %3Kamino sector%1, landing at a safe spot nearby the %3base%1.
3. Provide the %3base defenders%1 with air support until ground forces arrive.
4. Return to the %2Stratis airfield%1 when you've completed your objectives.
Key.Chinese:
1。搭乘%2直升機%1，並等待"毒蛇"小隊登機，然後起飛。

2。運輸"毒蛇"小隊到%3卡米諾基地%1，降落在%3基地%1附近安全的位置。

3。提供%3基地守軍%1空中支援直到地面部隊抵達。

4。當完成以上目標時，請返回%2斯特拉蒂斯空軍基地%1。
Key.Chinesesimp:
1。搭乘%2直升机%1，并等待"毒蛇"小组登机，然后起飞。

2。运输"毒蛇"小组到%3卡米诺基地%1，降落在%3基地%1附近安全的位置。

3。提供%3基地守军%1空中支援直到地面部队抵达。

4。当完成以上目标时，请返回%2斯特拉蒂斯空军基地%1。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: HELICOPTERS - Air-to-Ground Combat, Infantry Transport, Huge Terrain
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:直升機-空對地戰鬥，步兵運輸，廣大的作戰範圍
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示:直升机-空对地战斗，步兵运输，广大的作战范围

Container.name: x40_Land_at_mike26_intro
Container.situation: intro conversation for 'land_at_mike26'. used to explain, why player should divert from the former plan and land at mike26. played when player doesn't witness enemy troops being deployed from the cars, otherwise it is skipped.

Key.Original: Be advised, we've got enemy movement around Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，我們發現Mike-26基地附近出現了敵軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，我们发现Mike-26基地附近出现了敌军。

Container.name: x50_Landed_at_camp_rogain
Container.situation: hydra reports to hq, that they are rearming at camp rogain.

Key.Original: Be advised, Hydra is rearming at Rogain
Key.Chinese: 請注意，"九頭蛇"正在羅根營地進行補給
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，"九头蛇"正在罗根营地进行补给

Container.name: x45_Land_at_mike26_after_mortars
Container.situation: hq orders hydra to land at mike26, after they destroy mortars.

Key.Original: Hydra, deploy Viper-red at Mike-26 and report back.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，在Mike-26佈署"毒蛇-紅"然後進行回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，在Mike-26布署"毒蛇-红"然后进行回报。

Container.name: x35_Mortars_detected
Container.situation: player detects mortars before they start to fire at mike26.

Key.Original: Understood. Locate and engage those mortars.
Key.Chinese: 了解。尋找並破壞那些迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。寻找并攻击那些迫击炮。

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Hydra, we've spotted an enemy mortar emplacement nearby the radar facility
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"九頭蛇"，我們發現到敵軍的迫擊砲位在雷達設施旁。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，"九头蛇"呼叫，我们在雷达设施周边发现敌军的迫击炮位。

Container.name: x30_Bombardment_started_reported_by_hq
Container.situation: bombardment starts, but the helicopter is not landing (yet).

Key.Original: Be advised, Mike-26 is under enemy mortar fire!
Key.Chinese: 請注意，Mike-26正遭受到敵軍的迫擊砲攻擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，Mike-26正遭受到敌军的迫击炮攻击!

Key.Original: Locate and engage those mortars, priority task, acknowledge.
Key.Chinese: 尋找並破壞那些迫擊砲，最優先級任務，已確認。
Key.Chinesesimp: 寻找并攻击那些迫击炮，最优先级任务，请确认。

Container.name: x25_Enemy_vehicles_near_base_reported_by_hq
Container.situation: hq reports: enemy troops near mike26 (carried there by the cars).

Key.Original: Be advised, vehicles have stopped in the vicinity of Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: 請注意，車輛已經停在Mike-26附近。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，车辆已经停在Mike-26附近。

Key.Original: Enemy footmobiles are reported in the area.
Key.Chinese: 據報敵軍步兵已出現在區域裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 据报敌军步兵已出现在区域里。

Container.name: x20_Enemy_vehicles_near_base_one_alive
Container.situation: hydra reports: one enemy car reached mike26.

Key.Original: Hydra reporting ... one alpha victor has stopped just north of Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"回報...一臺敵軍載具停在Mike-26的北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"回报...一辆敌军车辆在Mike-26的北方停下了。

Key.Original: Enemy units disembarking, moving towards the facility.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍單位下車了，正在朝著設施前進當中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军单位下车了，正在朝着设施前进当中。

Container.name: x15_Enemy_vehicles_near_base_both_alive
Container.situation: hydra reports: both enemy cars reached mike26.

Key.Original: Hydra reporting ... vehicles have halted north of Mike-26.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"回報...敵軍載具停在Mike-26的北方。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"报告...敌军载具停在Mike-26的北方。

Key.Original: Enemy units disembarking, moving towards the facility.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍單位下車了，正在朝著設施前進當中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军单位下车了，正在朝着设施前进当中。

Container.name: x10_Low_on_ammo
Container.situation: helicopter has less then 1/2 the ammo. can be run multiple times.

Key.Original: Copy that, proceed to resupply at Camp Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 收到，請前往羅根營地進行補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，请前往罗根营地进行补给。

Key.Original: This is Hydra, we're running low on ammo.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"九頭蛇"，我們彈藥快用盡了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这是"九头蛇"，我们弹药快用尽了。

Container.name: x05_Idle_Getin
Container.situation: idle conversation; played every x secs when player is not lifting up with the helicopter.

Key.Original: We need to take off, asap.

Container.name: x01_Idle_Getin
Container.situation: idle conversation; played every x secs when player is not entering helicopter.

Key.Chinese: 飛行員，現在立馬給我坐上直升機!
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞行员，现在立马给我坐上直升机!

Container.name: 70_At_Home
Container.situation: hydra reports, they have landed at home base.

Container.name: 65_Fly_home
Container.situation: hq reacts to 'mortars_destroyed_kamino' and sends player home.

Key.Original: Well done, Hydra! Ground forces will take care of the remaining enemy presence. Return to the air base.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，"九頭蛇"!地面部隊會照顧剩下的敵人。請返回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，"九头蛇"!地面部队会照顾剩下的敌人。请返回基地。

Key.Chinese: 收到，"獅鷲"。我們返回基地中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，"狮鹫"。我们返回基地中。

Container.name: 60_Mortars_destroyed_kamino
Container.situation: hydra reports destruction of mortars near kamino base.

Container.name: 55_Go_kamino
Container.situation: base orders the player to move to support another base under attack

Key.Original: Roger, we need your support at Kamino asap. Vipers blue and green are pinned down.
Key.Chinese: 了解，我們需要你盡快去支援卡米諾基地。"毒蛇-藍"和"綠"正在被壓著打。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解，我们需要你尽快去支援卡米诺基地。"毒蛇-蓝"和"绿"遭到了压制。

Key.Original: Enemy forces have set up a firing position on a rocky islet to the east of the Kamino base.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍已在卡米諾基地的東方，一個巖石小島上設立了迫擊砲陣地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军已在卡米诺基地以东的一个礁石岛上设立了迫击炮阵地。

Key.Original: Fly there and neutralize the mortar emplacements.
Key.Chinese: 飛過去並摧毀那些迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 飞过去并摧毁那些迫击炮。

Container.name: 53_Resupplied
Container.situation: hydra reports, they finished rearming and are waiting for more tasks.

Key.Original: Griffin, this is Hydra, we're good to go here.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"九頭蛇"，我們這邊已經準備好了。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"九头蛇"，我们这边已经准备好了。

Container.name: 50_Resuppy
Container.situation: respons from hq to 'squad_unloaded', giving next task.

Key.Original: Understood. Proceed to the resupply point at Camp Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 了解。請前往羅根營地進行補給。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。请前往罗根营地进行补给。

Container.name: 45_Squad_unloaded
Container.situation: hydra reports that deployment of squad has finished.

Container.name: 40_Landed_at_mike26
Container.situation: hydra reports to hq, that they land at mike26 and are deploying troops.

Container.name: 35_Land_at_mike26
Container.situation: hq orders player to land @ mike26.

Key.Original: Hydra, unload Viper-Red at the facility and await further orders.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，請在設施旁卸載"毒蛇-紅"並等待進一步的命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，请在设施旁卸载"毒蛇-红"并等待进一步的命令。

Container.name: 30_Mortars_destroyed
Container.situation: player reports destruction of mike26 mortars.

Container.name: 25_bombardment_started_while_landing
Container.situation: mortar bombardment suprisingly ambush helicopter landing at mike26.

Key.Original: Understood. Locate and engage those mortars.
Key.Chinese: 了解。搜索並摧毀那些迫擊砲。
Key.Chinesesimp: 了解。搜索并摧毁那些迫击炮。

Key.Chinese: 幹..我們這裡正遭受攻擊!

Key.Original: Griffin, Mike-26 is under sustained mortar attack. Unable to land, acknowledge!
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，Mike-26正遭受迫擊砲的持續轟炸。無法降落，完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，Mike-26正遭受迫击炮的持续炮击。无法降落，完毕!

Container.name: 20_Enemy_vehicles_destroyed
Container.situation: both cars are destroyed.

Key.Chinese: 請注意，所有車輛已殲滅。
Key.Chinesesimp: 请注意，所有车辆已歼灭。

Container.name: 15_Enemy_vehicle_destroyed
Container.situation: 1st of the enemy cars is destroyed.

Container.name: 10_Enemy_vehicles_revealed
Container.situation: played when helicopter is flying from air base firing range base.

Key.Original: Hydra, be advised, we've got two alpha victors approaching the radar facility from the west.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，請注意，我們發現雷達設施西方有兩臺車輛靠近中。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，请注意，我们发现雷达设施以西有两辆敌方车辆接近中。

Key.Chinese: 明白了，"獅鷲"，"九頭蛇"改道中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 明白了，"狮鹫"，"九头蛇"正改变航向。

Container.name: 05_In_Heli
Container.situation: played when player enters helicopter.

Key.Original: Hydra, drop the response team at the Kamino base and await further intel.
Key.Chinese: "九頭蛇"，佈署快速應變部隊到卡米諾基地並等待進一步命令。
Key.Chinesesimp: "九头蛇"，部署快速反应部队到卡米诺基地并等待进一步命令。

Container.name: 01_Intro
Container.situation: mission start; 1st radio conversation on the airfield.

Key.Original: Griffin to all teams, get to your vehicles!
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"通知所有小隊，進去你們各自的載具!
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"呼叫所有小组，进入你们各自的载具!

Key.Original: We've got reports of multiple contacts to the east.
Key.Chinese: 我們接獲報告，指出島嶼的東方發生了數起攻擊。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们接获报告指出岛屿的东方发生了数起攻击。

Key.Original: %6 Infiltrate %2the camp%1 and steal the parked car%5%7 Drive to a position overlooking the %3military depot%1%5%8 Destroy any vehicles stationed there using the roof-mounted automatic grenade launcher%5%9 Move to the %4rendezvous point%1 and leave the island
Key.Chinese: %6滲透%2敵方營地%1並偷走停在那邊的車輛%5%7開車到可以觀察%3軍事倉庫%1的地方%5%8使用車輛頭頂上的榴彈發射器，摧毀停在那邊的任何一輛車輛%5%9移動到%4撤離點%1來離開這島嶼
Key.Chinesesimp: %6渗透%2敌方营地%1并偷走停在那边的车辆%5%7开车到可以观察%3军事仓库%1的地方%5%8使用车辆车顶的榴弹发射器摧毁停在那边的任何车辆%5%9移动到%4撤离点%1来离开这岛屿

Key.Original: Acquire a heavily-armed vehicle and disrupt enemy logistics by destroying their central %2vehicle depot%1.
Key.Chinese: 獲得一臺武裝車輛，摧毀%2敵方車庫%1來擾亂他們的後勤系統。
Key.Chinesesimp: 获得一台武装车辆，摧毁%2敌方车库%1来扰乱他们的后勤系统。

Key.Original: %2Viper Black%3 - you%1%4Viper Green%3 - strike team; tasked to sabotage the radar array%1Griffin - command
Key.Chinese: %2"毒蛇-黑"%3-你%1%4"毒蛇-綠"%3-突擊隊;負責破壞雷達陣列%1"獅鷲"-指揮官
Key.Chinesesimp: %2"毒蛇-黑"%3-你%1%4"毒蛇-绿"%3-突击组;负责破坏雷达阵列%1"狮鹫"-指挥官

Key.Original: With the entire island firmly under enemy control, command wants us to disrupt their comms and logistics network.%1%1One team, Viper-Green, is already in position and is poised to sabotage the %2radar array%3. We need you, call sign Viper-Black, to strike a blow against the enemy's vehicle depot.%1%1An unorthodox opportunity has presented itself in the form of a weakly defended base and a heavily-armed vehicle. We'll turn the enemy's firepower against them and exfiltrate amid the resulting confusion.
Key.Chinese: 隨著整個島陷入敵軍的控制，指揮官要我們擾亂他們的通訊和後勤系統。%1%1其中"毒蛇-綠"小隊，已經就定位並準備去破壞%2雷達陣列%3。我們需要你去打擊敵方的車庫，而你的呼號是"毒蛇-黑"。%1%1我們發現到有一個防禦薄弱的基地，其中的武裝車輛提供了我們一個機會。我們將使用他們自己的槍去攻擊他們，並趁著混亂來逃離這個島
Key.Chinesesimp: 随着整个岛陷入敌军的控制，指挥官要我们扰乱他们的通信和后勤系统。%1%1"毒蛇-绿"小组，已经就定位并准备破坏%2雷达阵列%3。我们需要你去打击敌方的车库，而你的呼号是"毒蛇-黑"。%1%1我们发现了一个防御薄弱的基地，其中的武装车辆为我们提供了一个机会。我们将使用他们自己的武器攻击他们，并趁着混乱撤出该岛

Key.Original: Try out Arma 3's new vehicle handling. Infiltrate the enemy base, steal the car, and enjoy the fire-power of its mounted weapons.
Key.Chinese: 嘗試武裝突襲3新的車輛操作手感。滲透敵方基地，偷走車輛，並且體驗一下裝載在它上面的火力。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尝试武装突袭3新的车辆操作手感。渗透敌方基地，偷走车辆，并且体验一下装载在它上面的火力。

Key.Original: Not only did you fulfill your primary objective, you also made sure Viper-Green made it back alive. Exceptional job.
Key.Chinese: 你不僅完成了主要目標，你同時也確保"毒蛇-綠"可以活著回來。你實在太棒了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你不仅完成了主要目标，你同时也让"毒蛇-绿"能活着回来。干得漂亮。

Key.Original: You failed to destroy the enemy vehicles, but at least you made sure Viper-Green made it back alive.
Key.Chinese: 你無法完成破壞敵方車輛的工作，但至少你確保了"毒蛇-綠"可以活著回來。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你无法完成破坏敌方车辆的工作，但至少你确保了"毒蛇-绿"可以活着回来。

Key.Original: The loss of Viper-Green is unfortunate, but you completed your mission. That is important. Good job.
Key.Chinese: 雖然我們不幸損失了"毒蛇-綠"，但至少你完成了主要目標。這才是最重要的事。幹的好。
Key.Chinesesimp: 虽然我们不幸损失了"毒蛇-绿"，但至少你完成了主要目标。这才是最重要的事。干的好。

Key.Original: The mission was a total disaster. Not only are the enemy vehicles still intact, but we've also lost Viper-Green. You are not worthy of your rank.
Key.Chinese: 這任務完全就是ㄧ場災難。不僅敵人的車輛還完好無缺，同時我們也失去了"毒蛇-綠"。你並不配你肩膀上的軍階。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这任务完全就是一场灾难。不仅敌人的车辆还完好无缺，我们还失去了"毒蛇-绿"。你不配你肩膀上的军衔。

Key.Original: You are stranded in enemy territory.
Steal the enemy vehicle parked in %1the camp%2.
Key.Chinese: 偷走停在%1敵方營地%2裡的車輛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 偷走停在%1敌方营地%2里的车辆。

Key.Original: Destroy all the vehicles parked in the %1military depot%2.
Key.Chinese: 摧毀所有停在%1軍事倉庫%2裡的敵方車輛。
Key.Chinesesimp: 摧毁所有停在%1军事仓库%2里的敌方车辆。

Key.Original: We need a further diversion so that Bravo-Green can retreat. Blowing up the radio tower near the main town should do the trick.
Key.Chinese: 我們需要製造些聲響，造成聲東擊西的效果，好讓"布拉沃-綠"可以撤退。炸掉城鎮旁邊的無線電發射塔應該可以達到這個效果。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们需要制造些声响，造成声东击西的效果，好让"布拉沃-绿"可以撤退。炸掉城镇旁边的无线电发射塔应该可以达到这个效果。

Key.Chinese: 炸掉無線電發射塔(支線任務)
Key.Chinesesimp: 炸掉无线电发射塔(支线任务)

Key.Original: Rendezvous with your escort and leave the island to complete your assignment.
Key.Chinese: 與你的撤離小隊會合，並逃離這座島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 与你的撤离小组会合，并逃离这座岛。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: VEHICLES - Improved Driving Physics, Picture-in-Picture, Steal the Car!
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:車輛-進步的駕駛物理，後照鏡與倒車監視器，偷一輛車!
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示:车辆-进步的驾驶物理，后视镜与倒车监视器，偷一辆车!

Container.name: x10_Green_Dead
Container.situation: hq tries to make contact with team green. they're all dead by now.

Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"呼叫"毒蛇-綠"。請回報狀況，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"呼叫"毒蛇-绿"。请回报状况，完毕。

Key.Original: It looks like we lost team Green. I'm calling off the response team, Sergeant. Get out of there. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 看來我們失去"綠"小隊了。我正在撤離接應小隊，中士。快離開那個地方。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 看来我们失去"绿"组了。我正要求接应小组撤离，中士。快离开那个地方。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_Depot_Hardcore
Container.situation: player reports secondary task accomplished after losing the vehicle.

Key.Original: You had us worried for a moment there, Sergeant. Let's get you home. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 你讓我們擔心了一下，中士。該讓我們帶你回家了。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你让我们担心了一下，中士。该让我们带你回家了。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin, Viper-Black. Objective Two complete. I decided to improvise. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"毒蛇-黑"。2號目標完成。我做了場即興演出。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"毒蛇-黑"。2号目标完成。我做了场即兴演出。完毕。

Container.name: x01_Car_Dead
Container.situation: player reports target vehicle destroyed.

Key.Original: This is a massive setback, Sergeant. Abort the mission and continue to the exfil point. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 這真是太糟糕了，中士。取消剩下的任務，然後你繼續前往撤離點。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这真是太糟糕了，中士。取消剩下的任务，然后你继续前往撤离点。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Chinese: 該死...指揮官肯定不會開心的。
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死...指挥官肯定不会开心的。

Key.Original: Griffin, uh, this is Viper-Black. I... Well, the target vehicle is combat ineffective. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，嗯，這裡是"毒蛇-黑"。我...這個，目標車輛已經爆掉了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，嗯，这里是"毒蛇-黑"。我...那个，目标车辆已经无法作战了。完毕。

Container.name: 25_End
Container.situation: player meets up with his escort.

Key.Original: Good to see you, Sergeant. The boat's ready. Let's go.
Key.Chinese: 很高興見到你，中士。船已經準備好了。我們走吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 很高兴见到你，中士。船已经准备好了。我们走吧。

Container.name: 20_Green_Ok
Container.participants: PA O HQ;PA O Viper Green;
Container.situation: player destroyed the comm tower and saved team green.

Key.Original: This is Viper-Green, looks like they've called off their chopper. I think we can finally get out of here, over.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"毒蛇-綠"，看來他們已經把直升機叫離了。我認為我們終於可以離開這裡了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"毒蛇-绿"，看来他们已经把直升机撤走了。我认为我们终于可以离开这里了，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy, report in once you reach the exifil point. Viper-Black, good job. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，當你們抵達撤離點時在進行回報。"毒蛇-黑"，幹的好。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，当你们抵达撤离点时在进行报告。"毒蛇-黑"，干的好。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Container.name: 15_Green_Trouble
Container.participants: PA O HQ;PA O Player;PA O Viper Green;
Container.situation: viper green reports they're in trouble.

Key.Original: Viper-Green to Griffin, we've been compromised. Repeat, Viper-Green is compromised. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"呼叫"獅鷲"，我們正遭受壓制。重複，"毒蛇-綠"正遭受壓制。請求指示，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-绿"呼叫"狮鹫"，我们正遭受压制。重复，"毒蛇-绿"正遭受压制。请求指示，完毕。

Key.Original: Negative, Griffin. We had to pull back to point Sigma, but it in a couple minutes, we'll be screwed anyway. Over.
Key.Chinese: 否定，"獅鷲"。我們必須撤回西格瑪點，但只要在幾分鐘，我們就會被殲滅。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行，"狮鹫"。我们必须撤回西格玛点，但只要再等几分钟，我们就会被歼灭。完毕。

Key.Original: Viper-Green, can you make it to the exfil point? Over.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-綠"，你們是否能抵達撤離點?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-绿"，你们是否能抵达撤离点?完毕。

Key.Original: It's up to you, Viper-Black. We're dispatching a response team, but they're at least 10 minutes out. Viper-Green, hold your position. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 這由你決定，"毒蛇-黑"。我們正派遣接應小隊前往當中，但他們至少要10分鐘才會抵達。"毒蛇-綠"，守住你的位置。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这由你决定，"毒蛇-黑"。我们正派遣接应小组，但他们至少要10分钟才会抵达。"毒蛇-绿"，守住你的位置。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin... I can make enough noise here so they'll have to divert some of their units my way, over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"...我這裡應該可以製造些聲響，好讓他們派一些人往我這邊來，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"...我这里应该可以制造些声响，好让他们派一些人往我这边来，完毕。

Container.name: 10_Depot
Container.situation: player reports secondary task accomplished.

Key.Original: Good job, Sergeant, now let's get you home. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 幹的好，中士，該讓我們帶你回家了。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 干的好，中士，该让我们带你回家了。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin, Viper-Black. Objective Two complete. Moving to the RV. Over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"毒蛇-黑"。2號目標完成。正在移動到撤離點。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这是"毒蛇-黑"。2号目标完成。正在移动到撤离点。完毕。

Container.name: 05_Steal
Container.situation: player is driving from the enemy base.

Key.Original: Copy that. Keep your distance and let the grenades do the work. They won't see this coming. Griffin out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。保持你與目標的距離，然後讓榴彈發射器做好它的工作。他們不會察覺到我們的到來。"獅鷲"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。保持你与目标的距离，事情用榴弹发射器干。他们来不及察觉的。"狮鹫"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Viper-Black to Griffin. Hijack successful. Moving to objective Two. Over.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"呼叫"獅鷲"。車輛竊取成功。正在向2號目標前進當中。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-黑"呼叫"狮鹫"。车辆窃取成功。正在向2号目标前进当中。完毕。

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: PA O HQ;PA O Player;PA O Viper Green;
Container.situation: mission start, status report.

Key.Original: Griffin, Viper-Green. ETA to objective: 5 minutes. Out.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"，這裡是"毒蛇-綠"。預計抵達目標時間為5分鐘。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"，这里是"毒蛇-绿"。预计抵达目标时间为5分钟。完毕。

Key.Original: Griffin to Vipers Black and Green, report status, over.
Key.Chinese: "獅鷲"呼叫"毒蛇-黑"和"綠"，請回報狀況，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "狮鹫"呼叫"毒蛇-黑"和"绿"，请回报状况，完毕。

Key.Original: Viper-Black reporting in. I have visual on objective One. Out.
Key.Chinese: "毒蛇-黑"回報。我已經可以看到1號目標了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "毒蛇-黑"回报。我已经可以看到1号目标了。完毕。

Key.Original: %6 Swim to the bay and deactivate all three mines we've detected there%3%7 A %11speedboat%1 is guarding the area - you can sabotage its engine so long as you remain undetected and the vessel doesn't start moving%3%8 Eliminate the AA patrol stationed in %4the camp%1 and acquire a missile launcher - you can call in a mortar strike provided by %5Echo%1%3%9 Engage the chopper patrolling the western coastline%3%10 Make your way back to %2your team%1 and leave the area
Key.Chinese: %6游泳到海灣裡解除3個已被我們偵測到的水雷%3%7一臺%11快艇%1正在巡防海岸線，你可以偷偷破壞掉它的引擎%3%8摧毀敵軍的%4防空陣地%1並奪取一隻防空飛彈-你可以透過無線電%5"Echo"%1來呼叫迫擊砲打擊%3%9擊落正在海岸線巡防的直升機%3%10撤離該區，回去與你的%2小隊%1會合
Key.Chinesesimp: %6游泳到海湾里解除3个已被我们侦测到的水雷%3%7一台%11快艇%1正在防御海岸线，你可以偷偷破坏掉它的引擎%3%8摧毁敌军的%4防空阵地%1并夺取防空导弹-你可以通过无线电%5"回声"%1来呼叫迫击炮打击%3%9击落正在海岸线巡防的直升机%3%10撤离该区，回去与你的%2小组%1会合

Key.Original: Deactivate the underwater mines in %2the bay%1 and eliminate the chopper patrolling the coastline.
Key.Chinese: 解除在%2海灣%1裡的水雷並摧毀敵方在海岸線巡防的直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 解除在%2海湾%1里的水雷并摧毁敌方在海岸线巡防的直升机。

Key.Original: %2Omega%3 - your team%1%4Echo%3 - mortar team; stationed at camp Maxwell and providing support%1Papa Bear - command
Key.Chinese: %2"歐米加"3-你的小隊%1%4"Echo"%3-迫擊砲小隊;駐紮在麥克斯韋基地，提供迫擊砲轟炸支援%1"熊爸爸"-指揮官
Key.Chinesesimp: %2欧米加%3-你的小组%1%4回声%3-迫击炮小组;驻扎在麦克斯韦基地，提供迫击炮轰炸支援%1熊爸爸-指挥官

Key.Original: Following the OPFOR invasion, we've made a last stand in the south of the island. We desperately need to establish a safe route for reinforcement and resupply, and command has identified %3this camp%1 as our best shot.%4%4However, we've discovered that it's reinforced by a deployment of underwater mines, and protected by a garrison of enemy forces, including naval and air support.%4%4Other elements of your team, call sign Omega, have already taken up positions in a %2valley%1 to the south of %5the bay%1. Join them and execute your tasks.
Key.Chinese: 在敵軍入侵之後，我們的領地僅剩島嶼南部了。我們迫切需要建立一個安全的增援和補給路線，而指揮官已經確認了該%3陣地%1是我們的最佳選擇。%4%4然而，我們發現到他們已經部屬了水雷，並且派海軍與空軍守護著那裡。%4%4你小隊的呼號是"歐米加"，已經被佈署在%5海灣%1南方的%山谷%1中。加入他們並執行你的目標。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在红方入侵之后，我们已经被压缩到岛屿南部做最后抵抗。我们迫切需要建立一个安全的增援和补给路线，而指挥官已经确认了该%3阵地%1是我们的最佳选择。%4%4然而，我们发现到他们已经部署了水雷，并且派海军与空军守护着那里。%4%4你小队的呼号是"欧米加"，已经被部署在%5海湾%1南方的%山谷%1中。加入他们并执行你的目标。

Key.Original: Dive into Arma 3's new underwater environment. Swim undetected up the coastline and assault an enemy position.
Key.Chinese: 體驗武裝突襲3新的水下系統。保持隱蔽並拆除敵方水雷和摧毀直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 体验武装突袭3新的水下系统。保持隐蔽并拆除敌方水雷和摧毁直升机。

Key.Original: The enemy no longer controls the bay. This should enable us to receive badly needed supplies.
Key.Chinese: 敵人已不能再繼續控制海灣了。這應該能使我們獲得急需的補給品。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌人已不能再继续控制海湾了。这应该能使我们获得急需的补给品。

Key.Original: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
Key.Chinese: 戰場上不容忍友軍傷害!
Key.Chinesesimp: 战场上不容忍友军伤害!

Key.Original: On the west coast of Stratis
Deactivate all 3 mines in the bay.
Shoot down the helicopter patrolling the shoreline. You can find an AA launcher somewhere in the enemy camp.
Key.Chinese: 擊落正在海岸線巡防的直升機。你可以在敵軍陣地裡找到防空飛彈。
Key.Chinesesimp: 击落正在海岸线巡逻的直升机。你可以在敌军阵地里找到防空导弹。

Key.Original: Find a missile launcher in %2the camp%3. An anti-air team stationed there at the moment should have one, and another is almost certainly in their vehicle. If you run out of rockets, search the buildings in the camp for an ammo dump.%1%1You can call in a mortar strike to create some chaos.
Key.Chinese: 在%2陣地%3尋找防空飛彈。在這個時間點，那邊應該駐紮了一個防空小隊，他們應該有一支防空飛彈，而另一隻一定是在他們的車輛裡。假如你用光飛彈了，搜尋一下建築物應該可以找到彈藥箱。%1%1你可以呼叫迫擊砲支援來製造一些混亂。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%2阵地%3寻找防空导弹。在当地驻扎的一个防空小组应该有一套，此外他们的车中肯定还有一套。假如你用光导弹了，搜寻一下建筑物应该可以找到弹药箱。%1%1你可以呼叫迫击炮支援来制造一些混乱。

Key.Original: Use an AA missile to bring the chopper down.
Key.Chinese: 使用防空飛彈來擊落敵軍直升機。
Key.Chinesesimp: 使用防空导弹来击落敌军直升机。

Key.Original: If you sabotage %2the boat%3 guarding the bay, it will remain static after the shells start falling, allowing you to first target the camp itself.%1%1To sabotage the boat, swim beneath it and use the Action Menu.
Key.Chinese: 儘管目標是敵軍陣地，但是假如你破壞正在守衛海灣的%2快艇%3，將使他失去行動力，讓它對你的威脅度降低。%1%1要破壞快艇，游到它船底後請使用動作選單，即可選擇破壞選項。
Key.Chinesesimp: 如果你破坏正在守卫海湾的%2快艇%3，它在弹着之后将留在原地，让你能专心对付营地的目标。%1%1要破坏快艇，游到它船底后请使用动作菜单，即可选择破坏选项。

Key.Original: Return to your team to be escorted back to our position.
Key.Chinese: 返回出發點跟你的小隊集合，並撤回基地。
Key.Chinesesimp: 返回出发点跟你的小队集合，并撤回基地。

Key.Original: Cpl. Ben Kerry, TF Aegis%3Ftelio bay
Key.Chinese: 下士本·克里，"神盾"機動部隊%3夫泰里奧海灣
Key.Chinesesimp: 下士本·克里，"宙斯盾"特遣队%3夫泰里奥湾

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: SCUBA - Special Equipment, Deactivating Mines, Underwater Infiltration
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:潛水-特殊裝備，解除水雷，水下滲透
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示:潜水-特殊装备，解除水雷，水下渗透

Container.name: 10_End
Container.situation: kerry meets his team.

Key.Original: Acknowledged, Omega, fine work out there. Out.
Key.Chinese: 已確認，"歐米加"，工作幹的漂亮。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 已确认，"欧米加"，工作干的漂亮。完毕。

Key.Original: Enough fun for today... let's head home.
Key.Chinese: 今天玩夠了...我們回家吧。
Key.Chinesesimp: 今天玩够了...我们回家吧。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, Omega here. Objective complete, ready to RTB, over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"歐米加"。任務完成，準備返回基地。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"欧米加"。任务完成，准备返回基地。完毕。

Container.name: 05_Chopper
Container.situation: kerry just shot down a helicopter.

Key.Chinese: 另一件幹的漂亮的工作...

Container.name: 01_Start
Container.participants: PA B Beach Guy;PA B Player;PA B HQ;
Container.situation: kerry's teammate wishes him good luck before kerry dives in the sea.

Key.Original: Papa Bear to Omega. Maintain radio silence during the op. Report in once you complete your objectives. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"呼叫"歐米加"。在任務期間請保持無線電靜默。在任務完成後再進行回報。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"呼叫"欧米加"。在任务期间请保持无线电静默。在任务完成后再进行回报。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Key.Original: Good luck, Corporal. Take a deep breath.
Thanks, Jimmy. Alright, here we go.
Key.Chinese: 謝啦，吉米。好吧，好戲上場了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 谢啦，吉米。好吧，好戏上场了。

Key.Original: Engage in Arma 3's infantry combat. Follow your leader and move through the valley to support a friendly squad pinned down by enemy forces.
Key.Chinese: 嘗試武裝突襲3新的步兵交戰。跟隨你的隊長，進入村莊並支援被敵軍襲擊的友軍。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尝试武装突袭3新的步兵交战。跟随你的队长，进入村庄并支援被敌军袭击的友军。

Key.Original: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
Key.Chinese: 戰場上不容忍友軍傷害!
Key.Chinesesimp: 战场上不容忍友军伤害!

Key.Original: Bravo were killed and we were forced to retreat.
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"全体阵亡，我们被迫撤退。

Key.Original: You successfully rescued our forces and neutralized the mortar, despite being forced to retreat. Given the situation, that's the best outcome we could have hoped for.
Key.Chinese: 儘管被迫撤退，但是你成功拯救了我們的部隊，並且也殲滅了敵方的迫擊砲。鑑於這一情況，這個結果已經是最好的了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管被迫撤退，但是你成功拯救了我们的部队，并且也歼灭了敌方的迫击炮。鉴于现状，这个结果已经是最好的了。

Key.Original: You successfully rescued our forces and neutralized the spotters, despite being forced to retreat. Given the situation, that's the best outcome we could have hoped for.
Key.Chinese: 儘管被迫撤退，但是你成功拯救了我們的部隊，並且也殲滅了敵方的迫擊砲觀測手。鑑於這一情況，這個結果已經是最好的了。
Key.Chinesesimp: 尽管被迫撤退，但是你成功拯救了我们的部队，并且也歼灭了敌方的迫击炮观测手。鉴于现状，这个结果已经是最好的了。

Key.Original: Hours ago, enemy forces launched a sudden attack from the north. They're steadily advancing south, driving us into the sea.%1Bravo has been pinned down by a swift assault on their position; now, they're trapped inside the %2village%3 and are in need of support. We're stretched thin and need to make a stand.%4An advanced element of your team has taken up a position in the valley. Regroup and report in, Alpha.
Key.Chinese: 數小時前，敵人從北方發動突襲。他們正穩定的向南推進，想把我們擠進海裡。%1"Bravo"被突如其來的突襲陷入苦戰;現在，他們被困在%2村莊%3裡並且需要支援。我們現在人手短缺，不能隨便放棄寶貴的戰力。%4你們小隊將被佈署在村莊東邊的山谷中。"Alpha"，跟友軍集合後進行回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 数小时前，敌人从北方发动突袭。他们正稳步向南推进，想把我们挤进海里。%1"布拉沃"被突如其来的突袭拖入苦战;现在，他们被困在%2村庄%3里并且需要支援。我们现在人手短缺，不能随便放弃宝贵的战力。%4你分队将被布署在村庄东边的山谷中。"阿尔法"，跟友军集合后进行回报。

Key.Original: %1Alpha%2 - your team%3%4Bravo%5 - friendly fireteam pinned down in the village%6%7Charlie%8 - Supporting element%9Papa Bear - command
Key.Chinese: %1"Alpha"%2-你的隊伍%3%4"Bravo"%5-被壓制在村莊的友軍小隊%6%7"Charlie"%8-支援小隊%9"熊爸爸"-指揮官
Key.Chinesesimp: %1"阿尔法"%2-你的小组%3%4"布拉沃"%5-被压制在村庄内的友军火力组%6%7"查理"%8-支援分队%9"熊爸爸"-指挥官

Key.Original: Clear the area of enemy forces with the assistance of %1Charlie%2 and reinforce the village.
Key.Chinese: 在%1"Charlie"%2的幫助下清理村莊裡的敵軍並鞏固該地點。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在%1"查理"%2的帮助下清理村庄里的敌军并增援该小村。

Key.Original:
1. Regroup with your point man
2. Proceed cautiously through the valley towards the village
3. Clear the area of enemy forces
Key.Chinese:
1. 跟你的偵察手會合
2。請謹慎穿過山谷抵達村莊
3。肅清該區域裡的敵人
Key.Chinesesimp:
1. 跟你的尖兵会合
2。请谨慎穿过山谷抵达村庄
3。肃清该区域里的敌人

Key.Original: Bravo are pinned down in %1the village%2. Clear it out.
Key.Chinesesimp: "布拉沃"被困在%1村庄%2里。去救出他们。

Key.Original: Mortars have opened fire on the %1village%2. Eliminate them before we sustain heavy casualties.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍迫擊砲正在向%1村莊%2開火。在我們的傷亡擴大之前解決它們。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军迫击炮正在向%1村庄%2开火。在我们的伤亡扩大之前解决它们。

Key.Original: Enemy artillery is inbound. Fall back to the forests.
Key.Chinese: 敵軍火砲轟炸即將來襲。撤退到森林裡。
Key.Chinesesimp: 敌军炮火打击即将来袭。撤退到森林里。

Key.Original: A member of your squad took point. Regroup with him and report in.
Key.Chinese: 你們小隊中的一員已先前往前面進行偵察。跟他會合後進行回報。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你们小队中的一员已先前往前面进行侦察。跟他会合后进行回报。

Key.Original: Your squad mate is down! Cover the medic as he tries to stabilize him.
Key.Chinese: 你的隊友倒下了!掩護醫護兵，當他正在嘗試醫療傷兵時。
Key.Chinesesimp: 你的队友倒下了!在卫生兵稳定他的状况时保护他。

Key.Original: SHOWCASE: INFANTRY - Overhauled Animations, Improved Weapon Handling, Refined Radio Chatter
Key.Chinese: 任務展示:步兵-徹底改革的人物動作，強化的武器手感，更加精緻的無線電對答
Key.Chinesesimp: 任务展示:步兵-彻底改革的人物动作，强化的武器手感，更加精致的无线电对答

Container.name: x10_Bravo_Dead
Container.situation: papa bear informs all units that bravo isn't responding

Key.Original: Papa Bear to all units, we've lost comms with Bravo. Presumed KIA. Fall back, ASAP. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"通知所有單位，我們已經與"Bravo"失去聯繫。我們假定他們都已經陣亡了。現在盡速撤退。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"通知所有单位，我们已经与"布拉沃"失去联系，推定全体阵亡。现在立刻撤退。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Container.name: x05_Mortar_Dead
Container.situation: ben kerry informs the other elements that the mortar is neutralized

Container.name: x01_Medic_Dead
Container.situation: alpha lead reports that the medic is dead

Container.name: 70_Retreat
Container.situation: papa bear orders a full retreat to the forests

Key.Original: Papa Bear to all squads, retreat immediately! I say again, retreat immediately!
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"通知所有小隊，立刻進行撤退!重複，立刻進行撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"呼叫各班都有，立刻撤退!重复，立刻撤退!

Key.Original: Heavy artillery inbound... Get out of there! Fall back to the forest. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 重型火砲轟炸來襲...快離開那地方!撤退回森林裡。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 重炮兵打击来袭...快离开那地方!撤退回森林里。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Container.name: 60_Spotters_Dead
Container.situation: ben kerry informs the other elements that the spotters are dead

Container.name: 50_Spotters_Located
Container.situation: charlie lead locates the spotters and starts the live feed

Key.Original: Spotters located. Patching in the live-feed.
Key.Chinese: 發現觀測手了。我們將隨時回報狀況。
Key.Chinesesimp: 发现观测手了。我们将随时回报状况。

Container.name: 45_In_Position
Container.situation: charlie lead informs the others that they are in position

Key.Original: Charlie in position. Scanning hills to the north.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"就定位了。正在搜尋山頭北邊。
Key.Chinesesimp: "查理"就位了。正在搜寻山头北边。

Container.name: 40_Charlie_Support
Container.situation: charlie lead informs the other elements that they will help locate the spotters

Key.Original: This is Charlie. We'll assist with locating the spotters.
Key.Chinese: 這裡是"Charlie"。我們將幫助搜尋敵方觀測手的位置。
Key.Chinesesimp: 这里是"查理"。我们将帮助搜寻敌方观测手的位置。

Container.name: 36_Volunteered
Container.participants: PA B Alpha Lead;PA B Player;
Container.situation: alpha lead orders ben kerry to deal with the spotters

Key.Original: Corporal Kerry, you've just been volunteered!

Container.name: 35_Mortars
Container.situation: bravo lead reports mortars incoming

Key.Original: Spotters must be nearby! Someone's got to find them and take them out!
Key.Chinese: 觀測手肯定就在附近!有人得去把他們給揪出來!
Key.Chinesesimp: 观察手肯定就在附近!有人得去把他们给揪出来!

Container.name: 30_Town_Clear
Container.participants: PA B Bravo Lead;PA B HQ;
Container.situation: bravo informs the other elements that the town is clear

Key.Original: All right, Alpha... looks like we're clear. Thanks for the assist.
Key.Chinese: 好了，"Alpha"...看來我們已經安全了。感謝你們的支援。
Key.Chinesesimp: 好了，"阿尔法"...看来我们已经安全了。感谢你们的支援。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Bravo. We've taken casualties, but the village is ours. Please advise, over.
Key.Chinese: "Charlie"，這裡是"Bravo"。我們有人員傷亡，但村莊是我們的了。請指示下一步，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"布拉沃"。我们有人员伤亡，但村庄在我们手里。请指示，完毕。

Key.Original: Copy that. Alpha, Bravo, entrench your position and await further orders. Charlie's now en route with support for your wounded. Out.
Key.Chinese: 收到。"Alpha"，"Bravo"，鞏固你們的位置並等待進一步命令。"Charlie's"正在前往支援你們的路上了。完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到。"阿尔法"，"布拉沃"，巩固你们的位置并等待进一步命令。"查理"正在前往支援你们的路上了。完毕。

Container.name: 27_Ridgelines
Container.situation: alpha lead orders the rest to watch the ridge-lines

Key.Original: Contacts on the ridge-lines! Focus your fire!
Key.Chinese: 接敵，敵人在山脊線上!集中你們的火力!
Key.Chinesesimp: 接敌，敌人在山脊线上!注意火力!

Container.name: 25_Keep_Moving
Container.participants: PA B Alpha Lead;PA B HQ;
Container.situation: the situation worsens, but command orders alpha to keep moving

Key.Original: Papa Bear, we're a man down and OPFOR backup is flooding into the valley! We've got to fall back!
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，我們有人倒下，並且敵軍後備部隊已經湧入村莊!我們需要撤退!
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，我们有一人伤亡，而敌预备队正涌入村庄!我们需要撤退!

Key.Original: Dammit. Okay... okay, we keep moving, Bravo still needs our support!
Key.Chinese: 該死。好...好吧，我們繼續移動，"Bravo"仍然需要我們的支援!
Key.Chinesesimp: 该死。好...好吧，我们继续前进，"布拉沃"仍然需要我们的支援!

Key.Original: That's a negative Alpha, Bravo can't hold out much longer. You must hit the village now! Over!
Key.Chinese: 這是否定的"Alpha"，"Bravo"已經快要撐不下去了。你們現在必須立刻攻擊村莊!完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: 不行"阿尔法"，"布拉沃"快撑不下去了。你们现在必须立刻攻击村庄!完毕!

Container.name: 23_Negative
Container.situation: papa bear says le non.

Key.Original: Alpha-3, be advised, no support available.
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法-3"，请注意，现在没有支援可用。

Key.Original: Sorry guys, we're stretched thin here. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 抱歉了朋友，我們這裡已經擠不出人手了。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 抱歉了伙计们，我们这里已经挤不出人手了。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Container.name: 20_No_Hope
Container.situation: the medic reports that he cannot save the pointman

Key.Original: Alpha-3 to Papa Bear, Jackson's bleeding out...
Key.Chinese: "Alpha-3"呼叫"熊爸爸"，傑克遜正在嚴重失血...
Key.Chinesesimp: "阿尔法-3"呼叫"熊爸爸"，杰克逊正在严重失血...

Key.Original: ...I don't have the supplies to deal with this - requesting support at our position, over!
Key.Chinese: ...我沒有足夠的資源來為他醫療-請求支援到我們的位置，完畢!
Key.Chinesesimp: ...我没有足够的资源来医治他-请求支援到我们的位置，完毕!

Container.name: 10_Medic
Container.situation: alpha lead radios command

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Alpha. We've got casualties. Standby for update.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"Alpha"。我們有人員傷亡。等待我們進一步的報告。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"阿尔法"。我们有人员伤亡。等待我们进一步的报告。

Key.Original: Concentrate your fire down the valley!
Key.Chinese: 把你們的火力對準山谷!

Container.name: 05_Pointman_Dead
Container.situation: alpha lead finds the pointman down

Key.Original: Doc, check on him! The rest of you, covering fire!
Key.Chinese: 醫護兵，去檢查他!剩下的人，掩護射擊!
Key.Chinesesimp: 卫生兵，去检查他!剩下的人，掩护射击!

Container.name: 03_Pointman_Hit
Container.situation: the pointman gets hit

Container.name: 01_Enemy_Spotted
Container.participants: PA B Pointman;PA B Alpha Lead;PA B HQ;
Container.situation: the pointman reports enemy contacts to alpha lead

Key.Original: Copy that, Private. Sit tight, we're almost there, out.
Key.Chinese: 收到，列兵。你等一下，我們快要到了，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 收到，列兵。你等一下，我们快要到了，完毕。

Key.Original: Papa Bear, this is Alpha. Be advised, contacts spotted near the village. Do we engage? Over.
Key.Chinese: "熊爸爸"，這裡是"Alpha"。請注意，我們發現有敵軍在村莊附近。是否交戰?完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: "熊爸爸"，这里是"阿尔法"。请注意，我们发现有敌军在村庄附近。是否交战?完毕。

Key.Original: Sir, I've got lots of enemy movement here... looks like they're outflanking Bravo, over.
Key.Chinese: 長官，我在這裡看到許多敵人...看來他們正打算要包抄"Bravo"，完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 长官，我在这里看到许多敌人...看来他们正打算要包抄"布拉沃"，完毕。

Key.Original: Solid copy, Alpha Lead. Clear to engage. Papa Bear out.
Key.Chinese: 完整收到，"Alpha"隊長。允許交戰。"熊爸爸"通話完畢。
Key.Chinesesimp: 完整收到，"阿尔法"领队。允许交战。"熊爸爸"通话完毕。

Key.Original: The helicopters on the airfield suffered critical damage. You can either check the Kamino firing range for some boats or try to shoot down a patrolling helicopter. If you have an engineer in your team, he can try to repair it, as long as the pilot manages to land safely.
Key.Chinese: 我們的直升機在停機坪遭受致命的傷害。您可以檢查卡米諾的軍事靶場，找尋一些船隻或試圖擊落一架巡邏直升機。如果你的團隊中有工兵，則可以嘗試修復它，只要飛行員能設法安全地著陸。
Key.Chinesesimp: 我们在机场上的直升机遭受致命的伤害。您可以检查卡米诺的军事靶场，找寻一些船只或尝试击落一架巡逻直升机。如果你的团队中有工兵，则可以尝试修复它，只要飞行员能设法安全地着陆。

Key.Original: Escape from Stratis by any means possible.%1%1Your best chances are the %3airfield%2 and %4Kamino firing range%2.
Key.Chinese: 通過任何手段逃離斯特拉蒂斯島。%1%1您的最佳機會是透過%3空軍基地%2和%4卡米諾軍事靶場%2。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过任何手段逃离斯特拉蒂斯岛。%1%1您的最佳机会是通过%3空军基地%2和%4卡米诺射击靶场%2。

Key.Original: Escape from Stratis by any means possible.
Key.Chinese: 通過任何可能的手段逃離斯特拉蒂斯島。
Key.Chinesesimp: 通过任何可能的手段逃离斯特拉蒂斯岛。

Key.Original: WARNING: To be able to finish the mission, the group leader must be player-controlled.
Key.Chinese: 警告:為了能夠完成任務，隊長必須是玩家控制。
Key.Chinesesimp: 警告:为了能够完成任务，队长必须由玩家控制。

Key.Original: Attack observation posts to arm yourself properly.%1%1Try to stay together.%1%1Steal as many vehicles as you can.%1%1If your whole team is dead, the mission ends.%1%1It takes 30 seconds to respawn.
Key.Chinese: 攻擊觀察哨並妥善武裝自己。%1%1盡量待在一起。%1%1盡可能偷竊車輛，這樣你才能有機動力。%1%1如果您的整個團隊人員都死亡，則任務結束。%1%1重生需要30秒。
Key.Chinesesimp: 攻击观察哨并妥善武装自己。%1%1尽量待在一起。%1%1尽可能偷窃车辆，这样你才能有机动力。%1%1如果您的整个团队人员都死亡，则任务结束。%1%1重生需要30秒。

Key.Original: With all boats and helicopters destroyed, you have no means to escape the island. And enemy reinforcements are surely on their way...
Key.Chinese: 所有船隻和直升機都被摧毀，你沒有辦法逃出斯特拉蒂斯島了。增援的敵人肯定已經在來的路上了...
Key.Chinesesimp: 所有船只和直升机都被摧毁，你没有办法逃出斯特拉蒂斯岛了。增援的敌人肯定已经在来的路上了...

Key.Original: Once you complete your primary task, head back to the boats and leave the area.
Key.Chinese: 一旦你完成你的首要任務，回到船上並離開該地區。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一旦你完成你的首要任务，回到船上并离开该地区。

Key.Original: Target Three's location is camp Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 三號目標在羅根營地中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 三号目标在罗根营地中。

Key.Original: Target Two's location is the comm installation South of camp Rogain.
Key.Chinese: 二號目標的位置大概是在羅根營地的南方。
Key.Chinesesimp: 二号目标的位置在罗根营地南面的通信站。

Key.Original: Target One's location is Kamino Firing Range.
Key.Chinese: 一號目標位置在卡米諾軍事靶場中。
Key.Chinesesimp: 一号目标位置在卡米诺射击靶场中。

Key.Original: Elimiate three important officers currently garrisoned in eastern Stratis.
Key.Chinese: 消滅目前進駐斯特拉蒂斯島東部的三個敵方軍官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭目前进驻斯特拉蒂斯岛东部的三名敌方军官。

Key.Original: Eliminate three officers in the area.
Key.Chinese: 在該地區消滅三名軍官。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在该地区消灭三名军官。

Key.Original: Eliminate three officers in the area. Watch out for enemy patrols.
Key.Chinese: 消滅在該地區的三名敵方軍官。並當心敵人巡邏兵。
Key.Chinesesimp: 消灭在该地区的三名敌方军官。并当心敌人巡逻兵。

Key.Original: Experience the End Game mode in a singleplayer environment. Secure and upload valuable schematics on Tanoa before the enemy is able to stop you.
Key.Chinese: 在單人遊戲下體驗終戰模式。在塔諾亞上進行肅清與上傳武器藍圖的任務，別讓敵人阻止你完成任務。
Key.Chinesesimp: 在单人游戏下体验终战模式。在塔诺亚上进行肃清与上传武器蓝图的任务，别让敌人阻止你完成任务。
